name: mi-go serum
description: A super-concentrated mutagen strongly resembling a lava lamp.  You need a syringe to inject it… if you really want to?

name: mi-go mutagen
description: An extremely rare mutagen cocktail, it smells of sulphur and glows orange.
A super-concentrated mutagen not for those frightened of this thing they have become.  You need a syringe to inject it… if you really want to?
An extremely rare mutagen cocktail, it seeks to cure what's deep inside.
